title: Symantec Backup Exec 15 V14.2 FP4 Multilingual (Win-Mac-Lnx+Crac
description:
Symantec Backup Exec 15 v14.2 FP4 Multilingual (Win/Mac/Lnx)


Symantec Backup Exec 15 v14.2 FP4 Multilingual (Win/Mac/Lnx)

Complex infrastructures and the changing needs of IT require flexible and dynamic solutions that are not just built to last, but also built to change. Isnâ€™t it time for a backup and recovery solution that adapts to your environment, and that works with your budget? Then itâ€™s time to take a look at Backup Exec 15â€”backup and recovery that is built for change and provides the flexibility to protect your entire environment while also delivering agile recovery.

- Single solution for virtual and physical systems
- Hybrid architectures to disk, tape, and cloud
- Powerful, flexible, and easy to use

Minimize downtime and data loss
Now it's easier than ever to back up and restore your data, whenever and wherever you need it. With Backup Exec, you can back up your entire environment, including:

- Virtual environments running on VMware, Hyper-V, or Citrix
- Microsoft and Linux-based physical machines
- Critical applications and databases such as Exchange, SQL, SharePoint, Active Directory, Enterprise Vault, Oracle, and Lotus Domino

And store backups of your hybrid architecture to virtually any storage device, including:
- Disk
- Tape
- Dedupe storage
- Third-party appliance
- Hosted storage
- Public cloud, such as the Amazon Web Service (AWS) Gateway VTL

When itâ€™s time to recover you can easily restore any of the following either to the original or to an alternate location:
- Entire server or virtual machine
- Entire applications and databases
- Granular files and folders
- Granular application objects

Backup and recovery that outperforms expectations
With Backup Exec you can meet critical backup windows, exceed recovery expectations, optimize your existing storage, and eliminate outdated and siloed backup and recovery complexity. Backup Exec intelligently indexes and catalogs backup data so you donâ€™t waste valuable time and disk space mounting backup jobs, determining whatâ€™s inside, and searching for specific data.

Benefits of Backup Exec 15 include:
- Significantly faster Exchange deduplication and virtual machine backups.
- Up to 62 percent shorter backup times with LTO tape drives
- Optimized virtual machine protection through intelligent backup for VMware and Hyper-V virtual machines.

What's New in Backup Exec 15 v14.2 FP4:
- SharePoint 2010/2013 cumulative updates
- App Agent - SharePoint 2013 - December 2015 CU
- March 2016 CUs for SharePoint 2010 and SharePoint 2013
- Windows 10 client cumulative updates
- Windows 10 November 2015 CU
- Windows 10 December 2015 CU
- Windows 10 January 2016 CU
- Exchange cumulative updates
- Exchange 2016 CU1
- Exchange Server 2013 CU12
- Exchange Server 2010 SP3 RU13
- Exchange Server 2007 SP3 RU19
- SQL 2012 SP3
- Enterprise Vault 12 â€“ (without SQL AG)
- SUSE Linux Enterprise Server (SLES) (BTRFS) 12 SP1 without AOFO
- Red Hat Linux (RHEL) 7.2 without AOFO and Agent for Linux
- Red Hat Linux (RHEL) 6.7 and 7.2 (XFS) without AOFO
- vSphere 6.0 U2
